name: Lipa Frog: The Book
description:
Fred the Frog is off on a surprise adventure and he wants you to read along! Make new friends, learn to count, and join Fred’s adventure in this colorful interactive book!

• 23 beautifully animated screens;
• 3 challenging play modes--listen as a fairytale, read with your parents, have fun with animations;
• Learn counting with Fred the frog;
• Foster a love of reading and maths.

Lipa Frog is an educational app ideal for kids aged 4+.

Have you counted your way to the top? Discover other challenging and fun apps!

Enjoy voiceovers in your native language and even accent. Available in both British and American English, German, Spanish, Mexican Spanish, French, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Czech, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Swedish, Dutch, Vietnamese, Hebrew, Korean, Malay, Indonesian and Ukrainian!

Crafted by Lipa Learning, a community of educators and creative professionals dedicated to revolutionizing childhood development.

Lipa Learning
For Kids. For Parents. For a Better Future.
www.lipalearning.com
